profile.name: id Software
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Discord
profile.summary: Dedicated game engine developer and open-source enthusiast with a passion for preserving gaming history.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Discord
description: Developing and maintaining the Discord platform's game engine capabilities.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to enhance user experience.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to the open-source releases of classic games like Quake and Doom.
Worked on various game engine projects, including Wolfenstein 3D and DOOM.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained the Quake-2-Tools repository, ensuring its continued development and stability.
Collaborated with other contributors to improve the overall quality of the project.

Game Engine Development: Contributed to the Quake-2-Tools repo on 2023-12-05
